snippet.title: cybeRRRevolution - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
cybeRRRevolution (cyber-R-revolution) is an Indigenous action-adventure cyberpunk game about bartering with monsters, piloting godly mechas, and taking down bandits to secure a prosperous future for a nation of colonized peoples. Play as Sepsis, Rebel, or Barrett, each working toward a common goal of Recovery, Reconnection, and Rebuild.


Check out more at: https://brujeriaatwerk.com/cyberrrevolution/ and https://brujeriaatwerk.itch.io/cyberrrevolution
